      • addEdgeFeatures

        public void addEdgeFeatures(List<String> features,
                            State state,
                            String nodeName,
                            String neighborName,
                            Tree node,
                            Tree neighbor)
        Could potentially add the tags and words for the left and right ends of the tree. Also adds notes about the sizes of the given tree. However, it seems somewhat slow and doesn't help accuracy.

      • addEdgeFeatures2
